word: PRAYER NEEDED TO ENTER HEAVEN.—There is no such thing as our entering the heavenly portals through indulgence and folly, amusement, selfishness, but only by constant watchfulness and unceasing prayer. Spiritual vigilance on our part individually is the price of safety. Swerve not to Satan’s side a single inch, lest he gain advantage over you.—(SDA Bible Commentary, vol., 6, 1094.)
